description: This file defines Express routes for managing 'sprints' in a project management application. It includes endpoint handlers for creating new sprints and updating their state, utilizing middleware for authentication, permissions, and auditing, and communicates with a database and socket system.

methods.name: POST /api/sprints
methods.description: Creates a new sprint with provided details like project ID, name, goal, start and end dates, assigns a default state, logs the creation, and emits a socket event.

methods.name: PATCH /api/sprints/:id/state
methods.description: Updates the state of an existing sprint specified by ID, audits the change, and returns the updated sprint.
